queries.create: insert into rules_engine.unit (idUnit, idDisp, idRule, timestamp) select id id_mezzo , ifnull(id_disp,-1) id_disp, (select id from rules_engine.rule rule where id = #idRule# and idUser = #idUser# and rule.deleted = 0) , now() from pod.anag_mezzi a left join pod.anag_mezzi_disp d on a.id = d.id_mezzo where id in (#idUnits#) ;

update.update: update rules_engine.unit SET idUnit = IF(Isnull(#idUnit#), idUnit, #idUnit#), idRule = IF(Isnull(#idRule#), idRule, #idRule#), idDisp = IF(Isnull(#idUnit#), idDisp, (select id_disp from pod.anag_mezzi_disp where id_mezzo in (#idUnit#) limit 1)) where 1 = 1 and idRule in (select rule.id from rules_engine.rule where rule.idUser = 1 and rule.deleted = 0)

queries.delete: delete from rules_engine.unit where idRule = #idRule# and idRule in (select rule.id from rules_engine.rule where rule.idUser = #idUser# and rule.deleted = 0)
